sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"never-split-the-difference---chris-voss-w-tahl-raz"}}>{`Never Split the Difference - Chris Voss w/ Tahl Raz`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#never-split-the-difference---chris-voss-w-tahl-raz"}}>{`Never Split the Difference - Chris Voss w/ Tahl Raz`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#the-new-rules---how-to-become-the-smartest-person-in-any-room"}}>{`The New Rules - How to Become the Smartest Person... in Any Room`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#be-a-mirror---how-to-quickly-establish-rapport"}}>{`Be a Mirror - How to Quickly Establish Rapport`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#three-tones-available-to-negotiators"}}>{`Three tones available to negotiators`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#dont-feel-their-pain-label-it---how-to-create-trust-with-tactical-empathy"}}>{`Don't Feel Their Pain, Label It - How to Create Trust with Tactical Empathy`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#beware-yes-master-no---how-to-generate-momentum-and-make-it-safe-to-reveal-the-real-stakes"}}>{`Beware Yes, Master No - How to Generate Momentum and Make It Safe to Reveal the Real Stakes`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#bend-their-reality"}}>{`Bend Their Reality`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#create-the-illusion-of-control"}}>{`Create the Illusion of Control`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#guarantee-execution"}}>{`Guarantee Execution`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#bargain-hard"}}>{`Bargain Hard`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#find-the-black-swan"}}>{`Find the Black Swan`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"the-new-rules---how-to-become-the-smartest-person-in-any-room"}}>{`The New Rules - How to Become the Smartest Person... in Any Room`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Framing effect: people place greater value on going from 90% to 100% than 45% to 55%.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Prospect Theory: a theory behind why we take unwarranted risks in the face of uncertain losses. The most famous being Loss Aversion, which shows people are more likely to act to avert a loss than to achieve an equal gain.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`The psychological tactics required were to calm people down, establish rapport, gain trust, elicit the verbalization of needs and persuade the other guy of our empathy.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Listening is the cheapest and most effective concession to get to earning trust. It is not a passive activity, but in fact the most active thing you can do.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"be-a-mirror---how-to-quickly-establish-rapport"}}>{`Be a Mirror - How to Quickly Establish Rapport`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Good negotiators know there will be surprises; great negotiotars aim to use their skills to reveal these surprises.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Under you know what you are dealing with, you do not know what you are dealing with.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`George A. Miller put forth that we can only process about seven pieces of information at a time. We are easily overwhelmed.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`"A state of schizophrenia": the voice inside of one's head that you listen to can impede conversation. When two are in conversation, really there could be four.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`The goal is to identif what your counterparts need and get them feeling safe enough to talk and talk and talk more about what they want.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Talk slowly and convey one idea: I am in control.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Mirroring, also called isopraxism, is essentially imitation.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Don't commit to assumptions. View them as hypotheses and use negotiation to test them rigorously.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"three-tones-available-to-negotiators"}}>{`Three tones available to negotiators`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Late night FM voice`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`The positive/playful voice`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`The direct or assertive voice`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"dont-feel-their-pain-label-it---how-to-create-trust-with-tactical-empathy"}}>{`Don't Feel Their Pain, Label It - How to Create Trust with Tactical Empathy`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`"Seperate people from the problem." Don't get emotional.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`"The supreme art of war": to subdue an enemy without fighting (Sun Tzu).`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`The best way to deal with negativity is the observe it, without reaction and without judgement. Then consciously label each negative feeling and replace it with positive, compassionate and solution-based thoughts.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"beware-yes-master-no---how-to-generate-momentum-and-make-it-safe-to-reveal-the-real-stakes"}}>{`Beware Yes, Master No - How to Generate Momentum and Make It Safe to Reveal the Real Stakes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Compromise and conession, even to the truth, feels like defeat.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`"Yes" is a meaningless answer that hides deeper objections ("maybe" is even worse).`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Teach yourself to respond to "no" as something other than rejection, and respond accordingly.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Use the power of a "no" answer to provoke a response.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`By turning niceness into a lubricant, we've leeched it of meaning.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"bend-their-reality"}}>{`Bend Their Reality`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"create-the-illusion-of-control"}}>{`Create the Illusion of Control`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"guarantee-execution"}}>{`Guarantee Execution`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"bargain-hard"}}>{`Bargain Hard`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"find-the-black-swan"}}>{`Find the Black Swan`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
